name: UniData - Bicocca Data Archive
description: UniData is an interdepartmental center of the University of Milan-Bicocca, serving as the Italian point of reference for research data archiving and dissemination, following the model of major European national archives. It manages scientific and statistical data, particularly survey datasets such as Eurostat, ISSP, Istat, WVS, and Eurobarometer, and ensures open access according to data producer agreements.
data_themes: Education, training, learning outcomes and qualifications
Justice, legal system and public safety
